Articles.Content:
Want to move your kerbal around and don't have time to get a crew pod? Sick of boring RCS chairs? Well this little guy is for you. You can put a small tank of fuel on this puppy, put a 48-7s engine on it, lock the gimbal, turn off SAS and this bad boy will still fly straight and true. I built it for a thing I'm working on, but I also enjoy using it to go stock skydiving.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

If you're interested, I'll upload the craft file for the chair tomorrow and save you ten minutes of fiddling.

Aww Jake. I can't see your pictures at all.

Well, I see the poor Kerbal laying on the first one, but the others are so dark I can't see the craft at all.

I suppose I could have done some day shots. Tomorrow!
"unable to resolve the server's DNS address" in otherwords, its refusing to show picures

"unable to resolve the server's DNS address" in otherwords, its refusing to show picures

That wasn't my problem. My problem is that the pictures were taken in a cave at midnight during a new moon on an overcast night. And I'm trying to see them on a phone. (They are a bit dark.)
idk what happened to it last night, but, it wasnt resolving, today it is... and your right, its dark as night...bad pun lol
